long_description: With a built-in chamois pad, the Shebeest SB Cycloskort easily handles a short ride on a road bike or a relaxed, afternoon jaunt on a beach cruiser. Stretchy skirt drapes nicely, 6-in. side slits just barely reveal the bike shorts underneath and provide unhindered movement. Cushioning yet minimal Hourglass(TM) chamois offers 5mm of comfort on and off the bike seat. Chamois with seamless molded construction and ergonomic contours fit to a woman's body and eliminates chafing. Gripperless and elastic-free bike short liners are comfortable and stylish; they're also the same color as the waistband. Crossover waistband takes pressure off the belly when you're in the riding position.
short_description: With a built-in chamois pad, the Shebeest SB Cycloskort easily handles a short ride on a road bike or a relaxed, afternoon jaunt on a beach cruiser.
